tool_description: Analyzes potential drug-drug, drug-food, and drug-supplement interactions with severity classification and mechanism identification.

primary_drugs.description: List of primary medications to check

secondary_drugs.description: Additional medications or supplements to check against primary drugs

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity to report: minor, moderate, major, contraindicated

error_messages: Invalid drug list: Ensure all drug names are correctly spelled and exist in the database.
Severity threshold error: Use one of [minor, moderate, major, contraindicated].
Too many drugs: Maximum of 20 drugs can be analyzed simultaneously.
Interaction database unavailable: Unable to access interaction database for comprehensive checking.
usage: Provide primary_drugs list and optionally secondary_drugs. Set severity_threshold to filter results and include_food_interactions for dietary considerations.
